main event: Several eyewitness accounts and reports concerning an unidentified flying object (UFO) observed over Holloman Air Force Base in New Mexico during the late 1940s.
interesting points: The object observed was reported to be moving at a high rate of speed and at a high altitude of approximately 200 miles., Witnesses included radar technicians and civilian scientists associated with laboratories., Multiple reports indicate that the object was definitely not a balloon and possessed a rounded, indistinct form., A meteorologist suggested establishing an observation team for future sightings due to the credibility of the eyewitnesses., Several individuals reported seeing fast-moving unidentified objects on radar and visually, suggesting a recurring phenomenon.
location: Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico, USA
